result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ
result.translation: (26) And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur’ān and speak noisily[1391] during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."
result.footnotes: [1391]- Other meanings include "speak improperly" and/or "make a clamor."  The purpose of this was to prevent the hearing or understanding of the Qur’ān.
